**DATA MINING M**

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
esiti <- read_excel("~/Documents/mygithub/DM/exams/DM231118/esiti_DM231118.xlsx")
names(esiti)[7]<-"COMP"
DMM = esiti %>% filter(TIPO=="DMM") %>% select(-TIPO, -NOME)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
knitr::kable(DMM)
```

**DATA MINING (MODULO DATA SCIENCE)**

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
esiti <- read_excel("~/Documents/mygithub/DM/exams/DM231118/esiti_DM231118.xlsx")
names(esiti)[7]<-"COMP"
DMDS = esiti %>% filter(TIPO != "DMM") %>% select(-TIPO, -NOME, -"DA REGISTRARE")
DMDS$VOTO[!is.na(DMDS$SOMMA)] = round(as.numeric(DMDS$VOTO[!is.na(DMDS$SOMMA)]),2)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
knitr::kable(DMDS, digits=2)
```
